blog.title: Check out the Vue
blog.description: I've given my website a bit of a revamp. Not only have I finally added some content (more to come!) I've rebuilt it from the ground up using Vue, added a dark mode and markdown blog posts.

blog.title: Little Seeds
blog.description: Developed a Shopify Store for another good friend of mine Julie White. Little Seeds grew from a passion to create stylish but also gender neutral baby products.

blog.title: Init v3.2
blog.description: A new project init. A much improved version of my previous attempt.

blog.title: Rafael Tome
blog.description: Developed another website for a colleague of mine - Rafael Tome. I've worked with Rafa for the past 4 years, during that time we have created many beautiful things together.

blog.title: Core Principles for theming in Magento 2
blog.description: Completed the Core Principles for Theming in Magento 2 course.

blog.title: New Laptop
blog.description: Set myself up a new development machine, yup! Gave me an opportunity to look deeper into a few of my peers' setups, dotfiles and so forth. I decided on using the git bare repository method, thanks for the advice DistroTube.

blog.title: Oxted Classic Cars
blog.description: Beautiful cars, great family. If you've got a special occasion coming up - or just fancy a few hours in a classic - get in touch! You won't regret it.

blog.title: Magento 2
blog.description: For the last month I have immersed myself in Magento development. Installing an open source development environment as well as installing and syncing a cloud version on my PC and Mac.

blog.title: Netlify
blog.description: I feel like I am a little late to the party. I have discovered Netlify and am now hosting my website here.

blog.title: Project Init
blog.description: A handy gulp project starter template.

blog.title: Node Version Manager
blog.description: NVM is a local development game changer.

blog.title: The Ramblings of a Mad Man
blog.description: A little place on the web to share my thoughts, life and work.
